name: Integration Engineer
description:
At the moment we are looking for an Integration Engineer for developing integration scenarios in Dell Boomi AtomSphere to set up data processing and transfer between our core-HR system SuccessFactors and other corporate applications.

From you - general experience in integration processes and strong desire to develop your skills in enterprise system integrations are required.

From us - opportunity to learn and get certified in Dell Boomi AtomSphere, participation in complex projects working with a diverse applications environment and deep dive into corporate processes automation.

What will you do?

  • Develop, deploy and support integrations between HRMS SAP SuccessFactors and other corporate systems;
  • Develop scenarios in Dell Boomi for automation of data processing;
  • Analyze business requirements and make technical assessment;
  • Optimize and implement changes for existing integration processes according to updated business requirements;
  • Learn and pass certification exams for Dell Boomi AtomSphere Platform

What are we looking for?

  • 3+ year experience in development and operating integrations of enterprise applications;
  • Understanding of protocols: ODATA/ SOAP API;
  • Experience in Java, JavaScript development;
  • Intermediate English language skills required

What additional skills will help you stand out?

  • Experience in integration development based on Dell Boomi AtomSphere Platform is advantage but not necessary;
  • Understanding and experience in working with SAP SuccessFactors API is advantage

About Wargaming:

Wargaming is an award-winning online game developer and publisher headquartered in Nicosia, Cyprus. Operating since 1998, Wargaming has grown to become one of the leaders in the gaming industry with 5,500 employees and 18 offices spread worldwide. Over 200 million players enjoy Wargaming's titles across all major gaming platforms. Our flagship products include the free-to-play hits World of Tanks and World of Warships, as well as World of Tanks Blitz — the critically acclaimed mobile tank shooter with cross-platform support.

A career in our company is always an interesting challenge, as well as the experience that you gain working together with world-class experts.

Are you up to the challenge?!

Please see Wargaming Candidate Privacy Policy for details on how Wargaming uses your personal data.
